property.name: text
property.value:
The undesired behavior is to have gate open when the train is crossing the gate. To avoid this, we use temporal logic to describe the specification and generate a file acceptable by model checker NuSMV.
CTL Specification (Copy the line below when double clicking the SMV CodeGenerator) !EF (Train.state=within & Gate.state=open)

property.name: text
property.value: This is a simplified railroad system which simulates the interplay between a train and a crossing gate. When the train is approaching, it emits a signal to the gate and forces the gate to close. When it leaves the railroad crossing, it emits a signal to the gate to notify its leaving. In the right hand side is a simplified simulation, where the senerio is decided by signals emited

property.name: text
property.value: Authors: Chihhong Patrick Cheng, Edward A. Lee, Christopher Brooks
